main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 9 November 1957 at Fort Bragg, North Carolina.
interesting points: The report includes a detailed record card about the sighting., Information about the observation type and source is provided., The number and description of the objects observed are documented., The course of the objects is noted in the record., Conclusions of the event are also mentioned in the record card.
sighted object: details about multiple unidentified flying objects
